attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current income tax percentage for workers earning above £35k per year iS 40%! So basically, half of your hard earned money is thrown into the government to make 'a better life for Britain's' -- Well (1) The way tax money is spent in this country is ridiculous in some cases and (2) We would all have a better standard of life anyway if we had more money.
For example a person earning a total of £40,000 anually would lose SIXTEEN THOUSAND POUNDS in taxing and would live only on £24,000 of the hard earned money. This is abslolutely ridiculous!

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
